*

Dhaz Trox

Dec 9, 2013

Montano couldn’t believe it. They had named the new auditorium: Tits TITS Dream ** “And even the name itself, Habanero, means ‘Pumpkin of Love’.” *** There was road that went deep into the caves under Minnesota. Against the jagged stalactites the silver path, a geometric perfection, carried travelers armed with their own doors to the surface of the moon.
